This apartment is 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom. The apartment features vinyl flooring throughout the unit with large windows for natural lighting. The kitchen is complemented with a quartz countertop and a beautiful backsplash that blends in perfectly with the white cabinets and makes the kitchen look very modern and clean. There is plenty of cabinet space and all the appliances you can ask for inside a unit including a microwave and an in-unit washer and dryer. With an awareness of the vibrant, surrounding neighborhood, the builder took great care to provide high-quality sound reducing windows and walls to provide a relaxing home environment. About Fishtown and Northern Liberties: Located in the heart of Fishtown, just a half block off of Girard Ave and two blocks from Frankford Ave. 1141 N Front is walking distance of the best dining and entertainment around: The Fillmore, Fette Sau, Frankford Hall, Johnny Brenda's, Mulherin's, Sugarhouse, the Piazza at Schmidt's, and much more. Steps to public transit options - the Market-Frankford Line, the Girard trolley, and SEPTA buses as well as quick access to I-95 and Columbus Ave.
Main Floor Laundry Parking available Pets Allowed

Exceptional Apartment Living!  Located just off Route 63 and a half mile from English Village Shopping Center, The Hunt Club offers spacious apartment homes in North Wales, PA. Residents love the beautiful setting and the convenient amenities that can only be found at our community. With our combination of great floor plans and lavish features, The Hunt Club offers the best North Wales apartment rentals. Choose from a great selection of one, two or three bedroom homes that delight any lifestyle. Our apartments in North Wales, PA offer private entrances to provide you with a more unique setting. Convenience can be found with a washer & dryer in each unit making your day-to-day routine a breeze. All of our rentals also come with a private patio or balcony for you to take in the scenic country views right from the comfort of your North Wales, PA home. Routes 309 and 202 are just a mile away making your travel needs quick and easy. The Hunt Club is near the Northeast Extension of the PA Turnpike so you will never be far from great dining, shopping and entertainment venues. Our North Wales apartment homes offer a wealth of community features that include a fitness center, business center, basketball & tennis courts and a playground. You can also enjoy a peaceful afternoon stroll around the beautiful nature trail. Schedule a tour with our on-site management team and let us show you why The Hunt Club offers the best apartments in North Wales, PA. title: Beautiful Bi-Level 1-bedroom with Private Patio!
description:
Welcome to your new bi-level home in Fairmount! Located on a charming, tree lined street, this 1- bedroom apartment is perfectly situated to enjoy all that Fairmount and Francesville has to offer and walking distance to Temple and downtown.
This nearly 1000 sqft apartment was recently renovated and equipped with an in-unit washer/driver, central heating and AC,  stainless steel appliances, and a private patio to make your own. Conveniently located within easy walking distance of SEPTA’s Broadstreet line, major bus routes, and the restaurants and bars of Fairmount Avenue.

title: Fully furnished 2 bed/1 bath home
description:
Fully furnished 2 bed/1 bath home that includes a monthly cleaning service!! This is a charming, lovingly maintained home on a quiet block in the heart of Bella Vista. It is an artist-owned house that is tastefully finished with a mix of handmade pieces, antiques and more. The first floor features a separate living and dining room, exposed brick wall and a fantastic kitchen (all kitchen wares included) with exposed beam ceiling. Upstairs are two spacious bedrooms and a renovated bathroom. There is a skylight in the bathroom shower and another at the top of the steps, making this house light-filled and airy. There is a custom closet in the back bedroom and a unique storage nook in the front bedroom. Thoughtful details abound in this wonderful home! The basement features a full sized washer/dryer. Linens, a queen sized bed and a sofa are included as well. Unpack your bags and settle right in! Walk score of 99! This home is steps from several parks, Whole Foods, multiple coffee shops, bars and restaurants, public transportation, the Italian Market and so much more. *note* the bathroom is off of the back bedroom so this home is ideal for a couple or single occupant.
Parking available Laundry in Building
Contact Us For More Info

title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment, Wood Floors, Near Restaurants
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 11th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The renovated kitchen is fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., L'Occitane, Boyds, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Alice Pizza, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a scone at Metropolitan Bakery.
Community Features:
* 24/7 8,000 square foot resident lounge with wifi
* 24/7 Top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/Yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry room on 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
* Online resident portal for rent payments, maintenance requests, and more!
Apartment Home Features:
* Oversized floor plan
* Large closets
* Wood floors
* Breakfast bar
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* All utilities included
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to find out! Please make an appointment to tour with Resmate, our robot concierge on our website. Live virtual tours on FaceTime and in Zoom available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

title: **Gorgeous two-bedroom apartment-/-with new kitchen.!!!
description: Winston Rd,  In the heart of Chestnut Hill, this bright and wide 1950's rowhouse is sited on a quiet block with a public park across the street.  The four steps that lead  you off the sidewalk provide privacy from the street and make the front yard, surrounded by a privacy edge, a perfect spot to relax . This solid three bedroom, 1 1/2 bath house, with its gleaming hardwood floors, and newer windows, feels light and airy.  As you come up the steps to the front door, to the left is a patio with room for your grill and outdoor furniture.  From the front door you enter a spacious living room, with a large window overlooking the front yard. This light-filled space has beautifully finished oak floors, and a coat closet for necessities. The essential powder room is on the left, as you walk from the living room into the dining room. The dining room has a double-window, and a stylish pendant light .  The first floor is open, well designed, and coherent. The staircase opposite the front door leads to the second floor with three bedrooms, one bath, a linen closet, and a spacious landing. The primary bedroom sits at the front of the house, and has plenty of closet space and wall space for bed and furnishings. The two additional bedrooms are at the back of the house. One is currently used as an office. The bathroom, accessed from the second floor hallway, is situated between the primary bedroom and the two in the back. The basement is located through a doorway in the kitchen. At the bottom of the staircase is a large room presently used as a gym. Down the wide hallway is the laundry, the HVAC system, and the exit to the outside. The bonus is the one car garage with automatic door opener. There is a common driveway in the back that serves several houses. Across the driveway is an additional piece of land that belongs to the property. This lovely Winston Road row is walking distance to train, bus, shopping/dining on Germantown Ave., parks, and recreation.  Walls, floors, ceilings, and windows are pristine. As you know, this one won't last long. For more information and pictures call 🏠 ☎️  show contact info
